items.abstract: <jats:p>We discuss a potential steady heat conduction for composites with the coated cylindrical inclusion under an imperfect contact condition. We rewrite equivalently the considered problem to a conjugation problem for analytic functions which is reduced then to functional‐differential equations. Solution of the obtained system of functional‐differential equations is given in the closed form.</jats:p>
title: STEADY HEAT CONDUCTION OF MATERIAL WITH COATED INCLUSION IN THE CASE OF IMPERFECT CONTACT
